instructors.instructor_addr: Dance Offices, Marjorie Ward Marshall Dance Center

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Modern I is an in-depth introduction to modern dance technique, focusing on the complementary qualities of release and control. Students will work on strength and flexibility, both mental and physical, in order to become smart, versatile dancers. Class includes a warm-up, across-the-floor section, and phrase work, all working towards the break-down of movement defaults while simultaneously building up compelling, intelligent performers. Students are encouraged to find their own individual voice through an introduction to and study of various modern dance techniques, their histories, and contexts.
